pages.text: The centrifuge is the start of your nuclear journey! Craft a centrifuge base and two centrifuge tops, and place them on top of each other to assemble the centrifuge multiblock.

Items can be inserted in the top and extracted out the bottom. Power the base with a redstone signal to spin it up; the inventory will be locked when it is spinning (config setting)$(br2)Centrifuge recipes are probabilistic: each tick each slot in the left will have a chance of producing output in the right. If the right is full items will be ejected from the centrifuge. Check recipes with EMI.

Base outputs comparator signal for how full the 9 output slots are, and any other block outputs how full the 9 input slots are.$(br2)The main use of the centrifuge is enriching uranium; see $(l:alexscavesenriched:resources/resources_entry)Enriched Uranium$(/l) for more information.
